## Problem 1 

Import data, clean data, handle missing data, select data, mutate data:   
```{r}
subway_df = 
  read_csv("NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv", na = c("NA",".","")) |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  select(line:entry, vending, ada) |>
  mutate(
    entry = case_match(
      entry,
      "YES" ~ 1,
      "NO" ~ 0
    )
  )
```
